title: Who is Freshworksâ€™ new CEO Dennis Woodside?
description: Dennis Woodside replaces Girish Mathrubootham as Freshworks CEO amid market concerns. Woodside faces the challenge of steering the company in the CRM sector, focusing on small and midsize businesses, following Mathrubootham's exit.
content: With Freshworks CEO Girish Mathrubootham stepping down on Wednesday following a rejig, the board of the Chennai and San Mateo-based software major handed over the reins to Dennis Woodside.
cleaned_content: with freshworks ceo girish mathrubootham stepping down on wednesday following a rejig the board of the chennai and san mateo based software major handed over the reins to dennis woodside
